author: Bob Price, Bob Price
title: Texas Border City Orders Masks Worn in Public or $1000 Fine
description: Officials in Laredo, Texas, issued an order requiring residents to wear some type of face cover when out in public. Violators are subject to a fine of up to $1,000.
content:
Officials in Laredo, Texas, issued an order requiring residents to wear some type of face cover when out in public. Violators are subject to a fine of up to $1,000.
The city council in Laredo passed an ordinance requiring that all people over the age of five… [+2933 chars]
